channel.title: The All Pro Zone
channel.description:
[url=http://www.ephotobay.com/share/apzbanner2.html][img]http://www.ephotobay.com/image/apzbanner2.png[/img][/url]
Yeah so I've had my AllStar Source up for about 3 or 4 weeks now, and it's modestly enjoyable, but it honestly just has too many bugs that aren't worth fixing. Therefore, the new All Pro Zone is a PI/MW based server that is a lot more stable, yet still has a lot of content.
New Minigames | Lottery | Highscores | Gold Gambling | Point Shops
Forums @ theallprozone.com
Ingame Highscores Custom Point Shops Lottery System New Boss and Training Locations PKing Shops Working Clan Chat Gambling Working Fight Caves + Bank
